hints.content:
To find out how long it took Frankie to clean her house, we can find the distance from $\blueD{1{:}30}$ to $\blueD{6{:}30}$.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 1:30 to 6:30 with tick marks at every 3 minutes. The tick marks at 1:30, 2:30, 3:30, 4:30, 5:30, and 6:30 are labeled. An arrow moves right along the number line from the 1:30 tick mark to the 6:30 tick mark and is labeled plus question mark. !

A number line labeled 1:30 to 6:30 with tick marks at every 3 minutes. The tick marks at 1:30, 2:30, 3:30, 4:30, 5:30, and 6:30 are labeled. A series of five arrows are shown moving left to right from the 1:30 tick mark to the 6:30 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 1:30 tick mark and ends at the 2:30 tick mark and is labeled plus 1 hour. The second arrow starts at the 2:30 tick mark and ends at the 3:30 tick mark and is labeled plus 1 hour. The third arrow starts at the 3:30 tick mark and ends at the 4:30 tick mark and is labeled plus 1 hour. The fourth arrow starts at the 4:30 tick mark and ends at the 5:30 tick mark and is labeled plus 1 hour. The fifth arrow starts at the 5:30 tick mark and ends at the 6:30 tick mark and is labeled plus 1 hour. !

hints.content: $\goldE1\text{ hour} + \purpleD{1}\text{ hour} + \greenD{1}  \text{ hour} +\maroonD{1}\text{ hour} + \redD{1}\text{ hour} = 5\text{ hours}$

question.content:
Frankie started cleaning her house at $1{:}30 \text { p.m.}$ and finished cleaning at $6{:}30  \text { p.m.}$
   

**How long did Frankie clean?**  

[[☃ input-number 1]] hours
